revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netronix |model=W441A |revision= |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/28/2007 |fcc_id=NOI-W441A |pcb_id=37NB-W441A+410 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 66583S1 L626C; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160CBTC-70G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186;RTL8186, 66583S1 L626C; |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225;RTL8225, 68104S1 L834F; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305S;RTL8305SC; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2527L;SiGe, 2527L, 6009B;1; |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:08:54 |oui_eth=00:08:54 }} {{TagLine|802.11b/g Wireless VPN Router}} "37NB-W441A+410 REV: 1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Models of Netronix W441A, Netronix W441B, and Longshine LCS-WR5-2314 :are specified as covered in the FCC test report. *[https://github.com/kordewiner/netronix-w440a ''Netronix W440A'' on '''kordewiner'''] (GitHub) :FCC ID: NOI-W441A (2007-03-28) :Longshine LCS-WR5-2214-A ("37NB-W441A0+411 REV: 1.1") :Encore ENHWI-G2 ==Images== ---- ---- __NOTOC__
